description: Gagan Kumar Thapa (born 16 July 1976) is a Nepali politician and the current General Secretary of the Nepali Congress. He has been serving as a Member of Parliament in the House of Representatives of Nepal, representing Kathmandu 4, since 2008. He previously served as the Minister of Health and Population from 2016 to 2017. A former student leader and democracy activist, he was prominent in the movement against the royal regime and was declared a Prisoner of Conscience by Amnesty International in 2005.
short_description: Nepali politician who is the current General Secretary of the Nepali Congress and a member of the House of Representatives, Nepal.
